trends: There has been one other sighting in Slaughterville
There was one other sighting in Slaughterville on or around August 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile traveling southbound on 84th Street between Bryant Road and Duffy Road in an unincorporated area near Slaughterville, Oklahoma he observed to the west through the trees three lights ( one large light pulsating with two smaller lights lower on either side. When he came to a clearing where there were no trees he could see the lights clearer. There was a house in the distance and the lights appeared to be over the top of the house. The center bright light had a blue light circling it. As it passed in front of the bright light it made it look like it was pulsating. Off to either side was a smaller white light and above the bright white light was an occasional flash. When the red light flashed he related that he could see a large gun metal gray triangle shaped object. The bright light appeared to be in the center of the craft w the other two lights being the ends of the craft. He was able to take one photograph by using his cell phone. The photo shows the lights only. He related that the size of the craft was the size of a football stadium. The object left in an unknown direction. This report was completed by field investigator at witness request.
